value.name: Domestic violence, pedophilia, brutality and murder: Who do the Boston police really serve?
value.description: Early this April, the city of Boston released evidence that police union president Patrick Rose Sr. molested a child in 1995. This evidence has been withheld and covered up by the Boston Police Department since the initial incident.
